emailTemplate.subject: A new event from ${senderDisplayName} was added to your profile wall on ${localSakaiName}
emailTemplate.htmlMessage:
A new event from ${senderDisplayName} was added to your profile wall on ${localSakaiName}

To view your profile wall, follow the url below:
${profileLink}

---
This automatic notification message was sent by ${localSakaiName} (${localSakaiUrl})
Control what email notifications you receive from connections at My Workspace > ${toolName} > Preferences
